    • Method Detail

      • initializeBoardAndStart

        public void initializeBoardAndStart()
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Moves tokens on the associated board to the bottom (Board.moveTokensToBottom()) and fills the board with tokens (Board.fillWithTokens()). The resulting situation is immediately considered for matching and scoring.
        Specified by:
        initializeBoardAndStart in interface Game

      • acceptMove

        public void acceptMove(Move move)
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Executes the given Move on the associated board.

        The resulting situation is considered for matching and scoring, possibly resulting in chain reactions.

        Specified by:
        acceptMove in interface Game
        Parameters:
        move - the Move to execute and score.

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Returns the score of the game.

        How the score is calculated is described in detail on the task sheet.

        Specified by:
        getScore in interface Game
        Returns:
        the score of the game

      • setMatcher

        public void setMatcher(Matcher matcher)
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Sets a Matcher to use for finding matches on the board of this game.
        Specified by:
        setMatcher in interface Game
        Parameters:
        matcher - the new Matcher to use. Must not be null.
